DescriptionData.Title: Electronic Barbecue Grill Indoor Barbecue Grill With Adjustable Thermostat Drip Tray Easy Clean Non-Stick Griddle
DescriptionData.Description:
Welcome to LDLJJ's home, we will take care of each customer's feelings. This type of barbecue can be used outdoors for various purposes such as camping, backpacking, beaches, picnics, cooking, hiking, car tails, etc. It is also suitable for indoor use, such as various parties or family gatherings.

★ Features:
Lightweight, durable and hygienic. Enjoy a healthy barbecue!

★ Specifications:
Product function: Fried, roasted, fried, boiled
Rated power: 1400W
Suitable number: 1-3 (small) 1-6 (medium) 1-10 (large)
Product Color: Black
Rated voltage: 220V
Product material: Aluminum alloy
Rated temperature: 100-240 ° C

★ Packing content:
1 * Electric Grill

★ Note:
1. Due to the influence of the display and light, the actual color may be slightly different from the image color.
2. Due to manual measurement, please allow a difference of 0.5-1CM.
3. Place the grill in a stable, flat and non-combustible place.
4. Put tin foil under the charcoal of the grill can effectively prevent the body from darkening and extend the life of the grill.
5. Please keep the barbecue out of the reach of children to avoid accidents.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: ★ High-quality materials: Metal heat insulation board is safer, metal heat insulation board is used at the bottom to avoid high temperature burns, to prevent the desktop temperature from being too high, and the barrier property is good.

★ Unique design: The unique positioning bracket drains and drains oil, which is convenient and practical. Adjusting the bottom bracket makes the entire baking pan form a slope, which plays the role of automatic draining and draining oil. Note: The trumpet has no drain bracket.

★ Multi-level adjustment: The temperature adjustment knob-five gears can adjust different gears and different temperatures, automatically power off and heat up to the set temperature, and can grill different types of food at any time.
★ Safety seal: Waterproof, can withstand high temperature and get water, the heating body is sealed design, unplug the power supply and other water outlets before cleaning, and then use it again.
★ The most beautiful service: Welcome to LDLJJ's home. If you have any questions, please contact us first. We will resolve the issue within 24 hours. Hope to bring you the best shopping experience.
DescriptionData.SearchTerms: Barbecue Grill Portable Charcoal Grill Foldable Bbq Set For Outdoor Cooking Camping Picnic Garden Party Tool Kits Barbecue Removable Grills Fast And Comfortable Easier To Clean Especially The In Garden Picnic Camping Holidays And Excursions Etc
